ConnectionStrings.AZURE_SQL_CONNECTIONSTRING: [concat('Data Source=tcp:', reference(resourceId('Microsoft.Sql/servers/', variables('sqlserverName'))).fullyQualifiedDomainName, ',1433;Initial Catalog=', parameters('dbName'), ';User Id=', parameters('givingdatabooksadmin'), '@', reference(resourceId('Microsoft.Sql/servers/', variables('sqlserverName'))).fullyQualifiedDomainName, ';Password=', parameters('givingdatabooksadminpw'), ';')]
